channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 13:45 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community Artillery shelling. Take shelter!
item.description: 🔴 13:45 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community Artillery shelling. Take shelter! This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 13:31 The threat of artillery shelling in the city of Marhanets and the Marhanets territorial community has been eliminated. Stay tuned for further reports.
item.description: 🟢 13:31 The threat of artillery shelling in the city of Marhanets and the Marhanets territorial community has been eliminated.
